name: Rose Finance
description: What is the project about? Rose Finance is a fork of tomb finance on arbitrum. What makes your project unique? Rather than focusing on pegg strategy, Rose Finance offer a Debase model. History of your project. With most of our team members having been part of the crypto space since 2018, we have a strong belief in the potential of DeFi in this space. As a team, we recognized the need and potential to launch a unique Tomb fork on Arbitrum, unlike anything seen before in the industry. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Launching on Mainnet on March 20th What can your token be used for? It's a Dao token with debase functionality.
